website_summaries.verdict: If you need a lasting tribute to your cat that has passed, you will appreciate this urn's etched cat and superior craftsmanship.
pros: Ideal for your sweet pet cat, as it features an attractive hand engraved cat face and pretty detailing
Made of solid brass and comes in 2 color options
cons: Some customers reported difficulties removing a manufacturer sticker that was placed on the finish

customer_reviews.title: our beautiful feline family member
customer_reviews.text: After 21 years, our beautiful feline family member, Rat B, passed away. He'd brought us so much joy through the years. We wanted to keep him around to remind us of the wonderful years we had spent together . We looked around for reasonably priced quality urns. We purchased this one . When we received it ,we were totally blown away. The urn is high quality and beautifully etched brass. Christine from the Pet Memory shop sent us two emails to let us know the status of our order and contact info if we had any questions. If you are looking for an urn for your pet, don't think twice---order form Pet Memory shop. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Robin

customer_reviews.title: I love the brass ornamental top
customer_reviews.text: My beloved cat was black domestic short hair. The urn was smooth black and very dignified. I love the brass ornamental top. The etching of the cat head was perfect for him, since it looked like an etched picture of him!we didn't think that we would be so devastated about his passing. However he was part of our family for nineteen years. Your product met our expectations and beyond. You personalized it with a lovely card which I felt was sp wonderful. I would recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F. Romer

customer_reviews.title: Not something I wanted to purchase, but...
customer_reviews.text: This urn is much prettier than I expected. The photo doesn't do it justice. My Fat Murphy has a lovely resting place now and for that I am grateful. Christine, the owner, emailed several times and I was surprised because not many owners do that now a days. The urn came very well packed and I had no trouble with the top as far as it screwing on and off. It had plenty of room for my tub of love kitty. The gold is very simple, not brassy or overly done. And that with the soft black, it looks elegant. So, honestly, it wasn't something I wanted to purchase, but I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Just Pat

customer_reviews.title: Sam was a 14 pound cat and he fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Sam was my once in a lifetime special cat. Not just any urn would do, it had to be a special as he was. The resemblance is remarkable to me. A tip, place the velvet sack inside the urn with the draw string portion out at the opening. Use a wooden spoon handle to poke it around on the inside to line the urn. Cut the corner of the plastic bag the ashes were returned in and slowly pore them into the opening of the velvet bag. Tie off the velvet bag and tuck in the urn. Sam was a 14 pound cat and he fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a difficult time.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice for what is unfortunately a very difficult time for any pet owner. It's a little big bigger than a softball and easily holds the remains of my 14 lbs cat along with a couple of his favorite toys. The design comes exactly as is promised and the screw top is a nice feature. It also fits in well with other items around my house so it has both a place of prominence but doesn't stick out either. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a nice place to remember their loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: I pulled up Amazon and told him to find the best urn for Elliot
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's cat Elliot recently passed. He was in tears and so heartbroken. I pulled up Amazon and told him to find the best urn for Elliot. He decided on this urn, and after having Elliot's remains returned back to the family, he called me saying "Grandma, Elliot is back home." They have the urn displayed on the mantel and it is beautiful! Also, my grandson has a sense of relief knowing Elliot will always be with him.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: This is such a beautiful tribute to our beloved Max who passed to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful tribute to our beloved Max who passed to the rainbow bridge after 21 years. We miss him so much and this urn has been helpful in honoring our little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Summers

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful urn, we looked all over for the right one, and this one stood out. It has a threaded lid, so there's no chance of spilling if it happens to get knocked over. The carving looks just like the photo, and it's the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Andréa

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Only complaint I have is that the "product of India" sticker was on the cats face on the front of the urn and was difficult to get off. Warm water and dishwashing liquid helped a lot. Would have been better for the sticker to be on the back where there is no picture, or on the bottom. Fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Stone

customer_reviews.title: It is a good weight with lovely gold etching on the outside
customer_reviews.text: This urn was even lovelier than in the picture. It is a good weight with lovely gold etching on the outside. It was a little difficult getting our cat's remains inside as it came with a velvet pouch and the opening is somewhat small, but we managed. All in all, we are extremely pleased with our purchase. This urn is definitely nicer and a bettet quality than the urn we ordered from the vet for our previous cat. As previous customers have noted, Christine sent us two emails informing us of the progress of the order and shipping and followed up after it was delivered. I would definitely order again from her!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Harrington

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect. The carving is pretty and tasteful
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely urn. I haven't put my darling's ashes into it yet, but it's perfect. The carving is pretty and tasteful, and the threaded cap keeps me from worrying that it may get knocked over. I wouldn't dream of returning this, but Christine seemed very friendly and amenable in case there were issues (which there were not in this case). The note inside was also nice and appreciated during this very difficult time. My sweet Allie will sleep well here. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn, with expedient shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: We lost our pet cat on a Wednesday. He was scheduled to be picked up for cremation on the upcoming Monday, so it was really important to us that the urn arrive in time for his ashes. It did. We got the urn on Saturday and as such was able to send it with him Monday morning. The urn itself is beautiful; it even comes with a gorgeous bag for the ashes. I like that the urn has a twist top, so it's not necessary to have it sealed if you don't want to.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn of great detail and quality. A wonderful piece to cherish the life of our beloved, 20-year-old cat. He was such a beloved, kind companion to us. This is so special and meaningful to us. Many, many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: moonscape

customer_reviews.title: Nice urn.
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say it's a perfect fit. Our Maui was about 12 lbs when he passed after losing about 4 lbs thru his illness. The point being plan carefully when figuring weight vs urn capacity. We had the urn engraved which was no issue. Beautiful holder for our beloved Maui the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Barry P. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: striking cat design
customer_reviews.text: high quality ...really well made....looks magnificent....great urn for my beloved cat named Elvis
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Bacher

customer_reviews.title: The cat carved into the front almost looks like her, and helped me through my grief
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous urn just the right size for my Chubbs. I was worried about the quality, but it is definitely very well made. The cat carved into the front almost looks like her, and helped me through my grief. I'm glad I decided to purchase this for my final resting urn for my furbaby.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Blazek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The etching is very poor quality. Looks great from far away. Comes with a Made in India sticker right on the front and when you try to take it off, it scratches the jar. Returning as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Tastefully made
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and weight of the urn-not too big for my 10lb cats’ cremains and heavy enough where I don’t have to worry about it tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Not as Shown
customer_reviews.text: Please note that the etching on these urns is not what is shown. It is not as good and you will notice that the nose area is rounded without the point. Looks very second rate.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than it looks online. Perfect resting place for my fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this urn
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this urn. Based on the reviews and pictures of the urn on Amazon,I had no reservations about ordering the urn. I expected a quality product. However, the actual piece that I can look at and hold in my hands even nicer! Quality plus!
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.title: This IS a good chioce
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.Looks VERY much like the advertised photo. Great finish, appropriate opening size for the bagged ashes and supplied velvet bag, and finely threaded top for as good as a permanent closure. NICE piece.
customer_reviews.author: twaters

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Nice quality. Photo was a bit deceiving as it looked like it was more of a pearl color, but overall, satisfied w/product.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Stone

customer_reviews.title: A kind and comforting gift
customer_reviews.text: This urn is a true work of art and came packaged with a handwritten note from the artist. The etching is very deep and at night almost gives the impression of a night sky. This would be a very thoughtful gift to someone who had lost a pet or for your own loss.
customer_reviews.author: Bevfore

customer_reviews.title: well packaged and it is very beautiful. The engraving is beautiful and the top screws ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in 2 days, well packaged and it is very beautiful. The engraving is beautiful and the top screws on tight. The crematory wanted $250 for this same exact urn. My daughter loved the urn her beloved cats ashes are in and It really is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn that will carry our beloved kitty so we can take her to wherever we move. Great quality and I like that the top is threaded so it doesn't just fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the urn! I suddenly lost my 16 year old boy cat Merlin and this urn was perfect! I received the urn in 2 days. Thank you for the great service and wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: jr88fan

customer_reviews.title: The urn is beautiful. We would have like to get the cat's ...
customer_reviews.text: The urn is beautiful. We would have like to get the cat's name and dates engraved on it, but were not given the options. If we had, had that option I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast. Looks just like my cat who passed great service great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This looks better in person than on the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This looks better in person than on the pictures, it also feels nice and looks very nice. It's clear what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Wallin

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality piece befitting the use. Large enough for a normal size car.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this urn for my 9-10 lb kitty and all the ashes fit perfectly. The urn is gorgeous and is much prettier in person.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Big Yellow
customer_reviews.text: The title is my cat’s name, cuz he was big and yellow. Perfect match. Worth it. It’s not huge, and sealed tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: More Beautiful Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The pictures do not do this beautiful urn justice. It is definitely worthy of holding the ashes of Serena, my beloved Siamese companion of 19 years. Christine with Pet Memory Shop was very kind to keep me updated on the progress of my order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: This was actually purchased for me sister who lost her cat after 12 yrs. She saw it and fell in love with it. It's heavier than it looks and the artwork on the front of it is gorgeous. She is so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Zbydniewski

customer_reviews.title: This urn is absolutely gorgeous and the perfect keepsake for our little 18-year old kitty
customer_reviews.text: This urn is absolutely gorgeous and the perfect keepsake for our little 18-year old kitty. We have it prominently displayed in our living room with all our other fur kids who have passed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn for my cat. Well-made and nicely weighted. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Like very much !!
customer_reviews.text: Even though for a very sad reason, I am well pleased. Great quality...
customer_reviews.author: priscillalea

customer_reviews.title: and quality were/are all good. The reason we bought it was not good
customer_reviews.text: The ordering, delivery, and quality were/are all good. The reason we bought it was not good. We miss him so much -
customer_reviews.author: 7mtex

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: This is really a beautiful urn and is even more striking than the pictures can do justice. It's a high-quality piece, the engraving is intricate and finely etched and it serves as the perfect memorial. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: rjm

customer_reviews.title: The owner was so nice during this difficult time
customer_reviews.text: I received this in less than 24 hours after ordering. The owner was so nice during this difficult time. It is perfect and fit for a king just like my Chippy was 👼🏼
customer_reviews.author: Courteney

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful "final home" for my beloved pet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product in every respect. A wonderful "final home" for my beloved pet! I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an item such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: But great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I anticipated it to be. But great quality.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey banard

customer_reviews.title: It’s good.. but
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty, and very nice. But when I got it it came damaged and it was also late. When i received the box it was beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Shontay crane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The urn is beautiful and just what I wanted for my Luci.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Magnussen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and I'm so glad that I decided on this one. Looks very rich and I got a great cyber Monday deal. Will be a nice resting place for "my boy"
customer_reviews.author: Steve's Gal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn for my cat. Quality & craftsmanship. The etching was what set it apart from the others. A good way to honor the memory of your feline family member.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Roehl

customer_reviews.title: Sad I needed it, but happy with product and service.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and great service! Plenty of room for a 15-lb. cat as well as some of his favorite toys. For obvious reason, I am sorry I had to do business with Pet Memory Shop, but I was very happy with the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: hawkhusk1978

customer_reviews.title: Thank you. Five gold stars!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn, high quality. Very satisfied with this purchase. Exemplary customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bev S.

customer_reviews.title: looks even better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...looks even better than the picture. Thank you Christine for the follow up. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: sandy campbell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn for Small Pet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn! Looks even better in person. This was the perfect size (close to a large grapefruit) . It sits on my dresser to honor the memory of my wonderful cat and friend of 22 years!
customer_reviews.author: Vasiliki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful! I love it. A beautiful urn for an amazing beautiful cat. Vendor was amazing, the shipping was fast, and we love the urn. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice urn; the velvet bag is an extra nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice urn; the velvet bag is an extra nice touch. Seller contacted me my email to make sure everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn. Exactly as pictured. Perfect to hold the remains of my fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Victorey

customer_reviews.title: So sad that we needed this
customer_reviews.text: So sad that we needed this, but an elegant and beautiful urn for he ashes of our well loved kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lang

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doesn't begin to describe it and I love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doesn't begin to describe it and I love the pouch that comes with it. It was purrfect for my baby during this terrible time especially at the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and unique
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful craftsmanship and a wonderful tribute to my precious Aggie. Highly recommend to anyone who is on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: DKDT

customer_reviews.title: This urn is beautiful and just what I needed for me sweet Chloe
customer_reviews.text: This urn is beautiful and just what I needed for me sweet Chloe! Also loved the little note card that was included.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like my cat I just lost, love this vase. Shipped on time and product in perfect condition.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just we were looking for to honor our sweet angel.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Allen

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful urn and the face of the cat looks like ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful urn and the face of the cat looks like our cat. It will be a wonderful way to remember her.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mikowski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice urn. Gold color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice urn. Gold color. Very elegant. Wish I didn't have to purchase in the first place....but glad I got this one instead of others I was looking at.
customer_reviews.author: melissa c chabalko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with this urn; the price was reasonable and the quality was good. Ellen T.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen T.

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with the choice I made for my Sir Fer
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the choice I made for my Sir Fer, my precious friend for 18 years. Delivery was quick & was packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth a goldsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well crafted and lovely.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful urn.It has taken me almost eleven years to find the right resting place for my cat Tucson's ashes and this is it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This urn is perfect for my beloved cat that just passed. It's beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Pet Memory Shop Urn for Cats - Choose Color - Hand-Engraved Egyptian Brass Cat Urn with Free Velvet URN Bag Urn for Cats Ashes
product_meta.description:
This beautiful hand-engraved 100% brass urn is available in 2 colors and styles (Black and Gold). Hand-etched and painted with an Egyptian black or gold overlay, this cat urn securely closes with a threaded lid and has a felt-lined base. It is suitable for storing cats ashes in the size ranges listed below. 

Black Dimensions: 5.5" W x 3.75" Capacity: 30 cubic inches (appropriate for a pet weighing up to 25 pounds prior to cremation) 

Gold Dimensions: 5.5" W x 3.75" Capacity: 30 cubic inches (appropriate for a pet weighing up to 25 pounds prior to cremation) 

100% Satisfaction Guarantee 
We trust that you will be happy with the quality and design of our products, as well as our customer service.
feature_bullets: LASTING QUALITY - Made of 100% brass, is durable and easy to maintain, securely closes with threaded lid
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - from America's Trusted Pet Memorial Provider - Pet Memory Shop
SEE MORE PET MEMORIALS - See full catalog of pet memorials on Amazon: www.amazon.com/shops/PetMemoryShop
ONE OF A KIND FOR CATS - Each urn is hand-engraved and painted - no two urns are identical, suitable Urn for Cats Ashes in sizes listed below
